p: The virus itself is a 50 nm virion constructed from Capsid (C), preMembrane/Membrane (prM/M), and Envelope (E) protein in a lipid envelope [ 15]. Inside is a 10.7 kb positive sense capped RNA (+RNA) genome which also encodes seven non-structural proteins (NS1, NS2A, NS2B, NS3, NS4A, NS4B, and NS5; Figure 1) [ 15].
